name: Multi-Device WhatsApp Web UI
description: A web application to interact with multiple WhatsApp accounts simultaneously.

JWT_SECRET.description: A strong, unique secret for JWT. Heroku will generate one if you leave the value field blank during setup, or you can provide your own.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Secure password for the default 'admin' user. You will be prompted to set this during Heroku Button setup.

USER1_PASSWORD.description: Secure password for 'User1'. You can set this during Heroku Button setup. (Optional)

USER2_PASSWORD.description: Secure password for 'User2'. You can set this during Heroku Button setup. (Optional)

CORS_ORIGIN.description: The URL your browser uses to access this application. This will be automatically set to your Heroku app's URL (e.g., https://your-app-name.herokuapp.com) by Heroku during the setup process if left blank, or you can pre-fill it if you know your app name.
